    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función expresiva o emotiva</string>
            <string language="en">The expressive or emotive language function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die ausdrucksvolle oder emotionale 
Sprachfunktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La fonction-langues expressive ou émotive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A função de língua expressive ou emotive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La funzione di linguaggio espressiva o emotiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η εκφραστική ή συγκινητική γλωσσική λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Diferenciar enunciados que desempeñan la función informativa y la expresiva.</string>
            <string language="en">Differentiation between sentences that are responsible for the informative language function and those responsible for the expressive function.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Funciones del lenguaje</string>
            <string language="en">Language functions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Expresiva y emotiva</string>
            <string language="en">Expressive and emotive</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterscheidung zwischen Programmsätzen, die 
verantwortlich für die informative Sprachfunktion und die, die für 
die ausdrucksvolle Funktion verantwortlich sind sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentiation entre les phrases qui sont 
responsables de la fonction-langues instructive et ceux responsables 
de la fonction expressive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Differentiation entre as sentenças que são 
responsáveis para a função de língua informative e aquelas 
responsáveis para a função expressive.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Differenziazione fra le frasi che sono 
responsabili della funzione di linguaggio informativa e quelle 
responsabili della funzione espressiva.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφοροποίηση μεταξύ των προτάσεων που είναι αρμόδιες
για την πληροφοριακή γλωσσική λειτουργία και τα άτομα για την 
εκφραστική λειτουργία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachfunktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdrucksvoll und emotional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions-langues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expressif et émotif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções de língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Expressive e emotive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni di linguaggio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Espressivo ed emotivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
